website_summaries.verdict: The Sony WF-1000X earphones delivers some of the best audio performance we've heard from a true wireless pair, but so-so noise cancellation and some design quirks holds it back a bit.
pros: Excellent audio performance with rich, full lows and solid clarity in the highs
cons: Noise cancellation is good, not great
Earpiece charging contacts in case don't always line up

customer_reviews.title: Quality true wirless earphones
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, this product is high quality. It has good sound for true wireless earphones, not to say that it's bad. The sound is clear and these earphones are great for listening to music without the distraction of wires. Personally, I wouldn't recommend this for videos, as, being true wireless they have a delay. However this is not noticable when listening to music. I highly recommend this product. Even at its price, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: The product has a massive delay between sound and device making them completely unusable for anything but music. Watching videos or any other task that requests audio visual sync is a abhorrence experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earphones, very light to use with sheer comfort, matches my Bluetooth on huwaei mobile so easy, no problems. Music quality is totally amazing but you do need to install the Sony to hear and get full control. The earphones run at almost full volume for 2 1/2 hours. The pod case charger is outstanding small compact but efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyoungish

customer_reviews.title: Should have known better
customer_reviews.text: Various online reviews led to me to go against previous experience, which is to have avoided Sony's audio products since the 1980s due to drastic loss of quality ... a company once renowned for high-quality had lost its way. In respect of these: - Was disappointed, including iffy design of case. - Returned for refund, and replaced with Bose. - Sony still have not recovered their previous competency.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I read all the other reviews of these before deciding- f*** it, I’ll try it. I was apprehensive due to what some others had said, but I updated them with no issues and off I went. Sound quality is amazing for an older model, sound cancelation is second to none. Only niggle is the battery life seems to be demonised from the manufacturers 3hours to around 2. Otherwise they’re in decent condition for second hand, and pound to value well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peckalicious

customer_reviews.title: Must do better
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed when compared with competition, particularly the case with is cumbersome and provide only three hours additional use. The battery life is terrible. Three levels are highlighted; "battery level high" - 100%, medium 50% and low 20%. However at 20% it's only minutes before "Please recharge" is announced and they shut down. I bought for the much hyped sound quality and noise cancelling features. Both are equalled by much cheaper and better designed alternatives. The greatest floor however is the latency against video. It's so bad that watching any video is, while obviously not impossible, quite a lot more than annoying. I cannot recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. As new. Download the app to do the updates. Full rich sound and dynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear potential for great sound, if they worked...
customer_reviews.text: My example was faulty - at least, I presume it was a fault that made them so infuriatingly difficult to connect with my new A&K music player, so flakey. But the seller co-operated and I returned them for a refund. Subsequently I bought AKG wireless headphones which pair & connect fine, and which inspire more confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Gascoyne

customer_reviews.title: Nice round sound but right ear keeps cutting out
customer_reviews.text: Nice round sound but right ear keeps cutting out. I didn't hear as much noise cancelling as my over ear headphones, but it is much better than without NC. Not a massive base, but a good clean overall sound
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Isacsson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better. Sound quality is excellent and balanced towards bass which I like, without losing the important middle and treble. Noise cancelling depend on the fit, as it does with all in-ear sets. Get a good fit and the plane engine sounds disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Shortland

customer_reviews.title: A pocketable alternative to noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Check out WhatHiFi's review. The only point I would add is not to be too concerned about battery life as, realistically, almost all people will take a break from listening before the battery runs out and they will recharge in the case before you use them again. Sound quality is of the high level expected from the Sony engineers and the noise cancelling is very good, although in ear already provides solid sound insulation.
customer_reviews.author: MiniHeskett

customer_reviews.title: Better sound than most but poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: First class product has some crackle on connection but the sound is better than most wired headsets. Battery lasts about 1.5hrs max even at low volume, not the 3hrs as advertised, so I have returned them
customer_reviews.author: andyt

customer_reviews.title: Great OEM Product
customer_reviews.text: Such good value as a re-manufactured product! Noise cancelling is excellent, as is the sound quality. Just what you expect from Sony
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great ear phones, shame about disconnection issues.
customer_reviews.text: These were very good earphones great sound, good base, only reason I'm returning them is because the right ear kept cutting out whilst I was at the gym which is a shame, product very good except the disconnections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sublime
customer_reviews.text: I don't see what all the negative reviews are about to be honest. 8f you set them up correctly they are as titled in sublime.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Renewed but still broken
customer_reviews.text: Although renewed they visibly were good quality. However right ear took a minute before it stopped dropping out every time I pressed play. Also dropped out randomly beyond that. Also other websites have reported these as being heavy bass, but I found them tinny. So I wonder if there was a fault.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great! But refurb ones not good.
customer_reviews.text: Great little buds, the refurb once are not in good state unfortunately. There was quite a gap in the left bud. Will return them, but get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Reliably unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: As per a lot of other reviews, these have proved to be unreliable. The sound is fine when they are working but the right earpiece repeatedly cuts out - as though there is a wire loose - unless stationary with minimal movement. Battery life is nothing to write home about either. Still looking for something to replace my dead Bose QC20, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: TToot

customer_reviews.title: Works great with iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, excellent sound quality and like the way they automatically start up and shut down when removed and replaced into the charging case. Bought these at a great price and pleased they work with my iPhone so well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Moran

customer_reviews.title: Unstable connection.  Unusable .
customer_reviews.text: Right ear piece constantly drops out. Looking at other reviews it's a common problen
customer_reviews.author: not easily pleased

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good but little or no noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is almost non existent and this was the main reason I bought them. I tried turning the noise cancellation on a recent airline flight and couldnt tell the difference. I have previously used Sennheiser headphones that work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let down by battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy, handy travelling container for charging buds. Battery life disappointing - less than 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The best light wireless earphones for 3D music
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for three weeks now, connects perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy S8. Love the sound the quality especially in 3D. The phone has to be within a range of 20 meters distance away from you but for the best experience, I always to minimise this. Would highly recommend it, it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: tayeb

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these at any price - they don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d read the reviews before buying. Used them with iPhone X. Sound quality poor - very tinny. Noise cancelling non-existent. Right ear bud intermittently stops working. Attempting to upgrade to latest version of firmware fails at 50% complete on every attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Naish

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative
customer_reviews.text: Overall very comfortable and very easy to pair. Wish the noise cancelling could be a little better.....
customer_reviews.author: Chee Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Great value
customer_reviews.text: What hifi are right. These are really excellent and, at almost half price (refurbished), these are a real bargain. I would buy at full price they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Simply Not Great
customer_reviews.text: the headphones are ok, but not worth the price, noise cancelling feature isn’t great and the Bluetooth connectivity for music isn’t amazing either, often disconnects. Battery life is poor too. Music listening capabilities are ok, but video is really bad as it’s always out of sync. My suggestion is to avoid this product if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Frequent cut outs
customer_reviews.text: When my iPhone X is in my pocket and I’m listening to music, these cut out for about a second, twice in each song. Awful. And ruined the enjoyment of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones and the noise cancelling works well but the battery life is poor, less than 2hrs before they need placing in the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: L Dubey

customer_reviews.title: Cannot update
customer_reviews.text: Looked really good quality, but even after following other reviewers advice just could not get the product to update, so left with just one earpiece working after two hours of frustration. Returning. Overall no good then.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.Slater

customer_reviews.title: Ok earbuds, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, but they suffer from dropouts and the battery life is mediocre
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gregory Kaighin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not suited to using during sports
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but if your using for gym/running/training look for sports specific ones, as these are better suited to listening in more sedate surroundings
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity issue
customer_reviews.text: Right ear unit would not hold the Bluetooth connection. Returned the product due to this and therefore wouldn't recommend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ieuan morgan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Returned and bought Cambridge Audio Melomania One which are much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones ruined by Bluetooth issues
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, terrible Bluetooth issue means constant dropouts which makes these (otherwise) excellent headphones useless
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I could easily update the firmware but I couldn't improve the sound. It was like a 60s transistor radio!
customer_reviews.author: sean blogg

customer_reviews.title: better to buy new not reconditioned
customer_reviews.text: all looks good but i am sure not working as they should
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are really terrible and I’m mystified why they get 5 stars from What Hi Fi. No bass, right ear keeps cutting out. Awful. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Simon King

customer_reviews.title: No noise canceling or bass.
customer_reviews.text: No noise canceling at all. Very poor bass even with apps. Right one occasionally goes dead the price is too high for these problems. They are comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: ian fox

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of 'renewed' products
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 'renewed' set from Amazon and could never get the right ear to charge. It's a shame and I won't be buying 'renewed' again
customer_reviews.author: G

product_meta.title: Sony WF-1000X Truly Wireless In-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones - Black (Renewed)
feature_bullets: Industry leading wireless noise cancellation (please see below product description for disclaimer)
Chargeable carrying case for up to 9 hours battery life (3 hours battery life and 2x3 hours charges with case)
Truly wireless hands-free calls, listen free from wires and unwanted background noise with one of the industry leading noise cancellation
Smart auto-settings to optimise listening settings automatically based on user's behaviour

Connection strength may fluctuate depending on the environment and the specification and/or settings of connected devices such as smartphones, WF-1000X connectivity can be improved by switching the sound quality mode setting from priority on sound quality to priority on stable connection within the Sony headphones connect companion app, available for Android or iOS devices; as with all Sony products, it is recommended you always keep your devices updated with the latest available software, as and when notifications of availability are received; such notifications will be delivered to WF-1000X via the Sony headphones connect companion app, available on Google Play and Apple App Store

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
